Detailed Description

Implementation of a 'fast' random class.

X-Forge Util
Copyright 2000-2003 Fathammer Ltd

Note:
This is the initial implementation of a 'fast' random (noise) function. It is not meant to generate too good random numbers, and is just meant as a 'noise' function (visual effects).
